Summary: 6 objects, all white, all as big as a airplane, 3 on one side and 3 on the other forming a arrow.
trends: There have been 129 other sightings in Albuquerque
There were no other sightings in Albuquerque on or around August 22nd 2007
divs: sighting detailsi was driving west on i40 in albuquerque nm. the sky was clear, no clouds. it was about 9:50am on 8\22\07. i was just getting to the coors exit when i looked up in the sky and saw 6 huge objects, all white, all as big as a airplane, 3 on one side and 3 on the other forming a arrow. one broke away from the pack then went back. i looked down for 2 seconds to get my cell phone to take a picture and looked back and they were gone. i have never seen anything like that. it was like 6 white passenger airplanes flying in an arrow. they looked like passenger airplanes without the wings.
